name: Potion Brew: Co-op
description:
Hello, dear player. We offer you to build a new independent game community together, in which a user feedback will mean a lot.
We want to make a game where updates will be released regularly. The tool of your feedback can be our social networks, the official discord channel, or even a Steam review.
We want to grow together with you.


Spend your in-game time with your friends!
The game supports an online co-op mode (up to 5 players).
There is also a proximity voice chat.
Help each other, split into roles, brew potions together!


The main goal of the game is to brew potions for your guests. There are two ways to sell your potions: active and passive.
  • Active selling - open a shop for a constant flow of guests for a given time and brew ordered potions. The success rate of completed orders will matter.

  • Passive selling - no need to rush, brew any potions you want and put them on the sale shelf.

Choose the one that you like the most.

Rivals are waiting for you. They sell potions, just like you. Get ready to interfere with each other!

Wander through the magical forest and collect ingredients. Brew potions from them or sell them to a trader!


The Build Mode lets you arrange in your house everything the way you want!


Get new hairstyles and clothes with the earned gold and experiment with outfits.
We will regularly update the store with clothes and hairstyles, so you will need to keep up with the trends!

Happy brewing!
